SKILLS.name: Miner's Fury
SKILLS.description: Channel raw strength into your pickaxe, doubling mining damage for a sustained period.

SKILLS.name: Lumberjack's Rhythm
SKILLS.description: Fall into a steady rhythm, chopping wood much faster than normal.

SKILLS.name: Battle Stance
SKILLS.description: Brace yourself against incoming attacks, reducing damage taken significantly.

SKILLS.name: Power Strike
SKILLS.description: Your next attack hits with devastating force, dealing massive damage.

SKILLS.name: Quick Repair
SKILLS.description: Instantly restore durability to your equipped tools and weapons.

SKILLS.name: Bountiful Harvest
SKILLS.description: Gather extra materials from each resource node you harvest.

SKILLS.name: Sprint
SKILLS.description: Move significantly faster for a brief period.

SKILLS.name: Smith's Focus
SKILLS.description: Extend your smithing mini-game timer, giving more time for perfect strikes.

SKILLS.name: Combat Rush
SKILLS.description: Attack much faster for a short burst of time.

SKILLS.name: Field Medic
SKILLS.description: Instantly restore a moderate amount of health.

SKILLS.name: Keen Eye
SKILLS.description: Significantly increase critical hit chance for all actions.

SKILLS.name: Alchemist's Insight
SKILLS.description: Gain extra time for your alchemy mini-game and increase potion quality.

SKILLS.name: Treasure Sense
SKILLS.description: Dramatically increase the chance of finding rare materials while gathering.

SKILLS.name: Regenerative Aura
SKILLS.description: Slowly restore health over time while active.

SKILLS.name: Engineer's Precision
SKILLS.description: Extend engineering puzzle time and improve device quality significantly.

SKILLS.name: Tool Preservation
SKILLS.description: Your tools consume durability much more slowly.

SKILLS.name: Refiner's Touch
SKILLS.description: Improve your refining mini-game time and material quality output.

SKILLS.name: Battle Fury
SKILLS.description: Dramatically increase attack damage and speed simultaneously.

SKILLS.name: Enchanter's Grace
SKILLS.description: Gain increased chance for perfect enchantment patterns and rarity upgrades.

SKILLS.name: Second Wind
SKILLS.description: Restore health and mana simultaneously when you need it most.

SKILLS.name: Chain Harvest
SKILLS.description: Gather from multiple resource nodes in a small area simultaneously.

SKILLS.name: Whirlwind Strike
SKILLS.description: Attack all enemies in a wide radius around you.

SKILLS.name: Master Craftsman
SKILLS.description: Dramatically boost crafted item quality and gain massive rarity upgrade chance.

SKILLS.name: Fortune's Favor
SKILLS.description: Massively increase critical chance and rarity for all actions.

SKILLS.name: Phoenix Resurrection
SKILLS.description: Continuously regenerate massive health and repair equipment durability.

SKILLS.name: Absolute Destruction
SKILLS.description: Unleash catastrophic damage in a massive area, obliterating everything.

SKILLS.name: Endless Bounty
SKILLS.description: Gain massive bonus materials from every gather for an extended period.

SKILLS.name: Time Dilation
SKILLS.description: Massively extend all mini-game timers, giving you all the time you need.

SKILLS.name: Reality Breach
SKILLS.description: Temporarily ignore all tier restrictions and requirements. Use any tool on any material, craft at any station.

SKILLS.name: Omega Strike
SKILLS.description: A single attack of unimaginable power that ignores defenses and deals catastrophic damage.

CLASSES.name: Warrior
CLASSES.description: Masters of combat and physical might. Warriors excel at dealing and taking damage in melee combat.
CLASSES.narrative: Steel and strength. You are the immovable wall, the unstoppable force. When enemies see you, they know: their time has come.
CLASSES.playstyle: Direct combat, high survivability, straightforward gameplay

CLASSES.name: Ranger
CLASSES.description: Swift explorers and natural harvesters. Rangers move quickly and gather resources efficiently.
CLASSES.narrative: The wilderness is your home. Trees fall faster before you, and you move like the wind. Nature bends to those who respect it.

CLASSES.name: Scholar
CLASSES.description: Intellectuals who master alchemy and magical arts. Scholars excel at discovery and experimentation.
CLASSES.narrative: Knowledge is power, and you wield both. Potions brew faster in your hands, recipes reveal themselves, and magic bends to your will.

CLASSES.name: Artisan
CLASSES.description: Master crafters who excel at all creation disciplines. Artisans create better items faster.
CLASSES.narrative: Your hands shape reality. What takes others hours, you complete in moments. What they craft once, you perfect instantly.

CLASSES.name: Scavenger
CLASSES.description: Lucky opportunists who find better loot and resources. Scavengers thrive on discovery.
CLASSES.narrative: Where others see rocks, you see treasures. Fortune favors the prepared, and you are always prepared.

CLASSES.name: Adventurer
CLASSES.description: Balanced generalists who dabble in everything. Adventurers have flexibility and choice.
CLASSES.narrative: You are not confined by tradition or specialty. Every path is open, every skill within reach. You are limitless.

NPCS.name: Elder Sage
dialogue: Welcome, traveler! I sense great potential within you.
These lands are filled with resources to gather and enemies to defeat.
I have a small task for you, if you're willing to help.

NPCS.name: Wandering Trader
dialogue: Greetings! I've traveled far and wide.
I seek brave adventurers to help with my research.

NPCS.name: Battle Master
dialogue: Ho there, warrior! Ready to test your mettle?
The wilds are dangerous, but I can help you prepare.
Defeat some enemies, and I'll reward your bravery.

QUESTS.name: First Steps
QUESTS.description: The Elder Sage wants you to gather 5 oak logs to prove your resourcefulness.

QUESTS.name: Material Research
QUESTS.description: The Wandering Trader needs 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore for his studies.

QUESTS.name: Prove Your Worth
QUESTS.description: The Battle Master challenges you to defeat 3 enemies to prove your combat prowess.

description.short: Gather 5 oak logs for the Elder Sage
description.long: The Elder Sage wants you to gather 5 oak logs to prove your resourcefulness. Approach oak trees and use your axe to gather wood.
description.narrative: Every journey begins with a single step. Show me you can gather what nature provides.

description.short: Collect 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore
description.long: The Wandering Trader needs 3 copper ore and 3 iron ore for his studies. Mine rocks to find these ores.
description.narrative: I study the properties of metals. Help me gather samples and I'll reward you handsomely.

description.long: The Battle Master challenges you to defeat 3 enemies to prove your combat prowess. Venture into the wilderness and return victorious.
description.narrative: A warrior is defined by their deeds. Show me you can stand against the dangers of this world.

TITLES.name: Novice Miner
TITLES.description: Your first steps into the depths. Every mine begins with a single swing.

TITLES.name: Novice Lumberjack
TITLES.description: The forest acknowledges your presence. Trees fall before you.

TITLES.name: Novice Smith
TITLES.description: The forge accepts you. Your hammer rings with purpose.

TITLES.name: Novice Warrior
TITLES.description: First blood has been drawn. You've tasted battle and survived.

TITLES.name: Apprentice Flame Miner
TITLES.description: Fire-veined ores call to you. The heat of the deep welcomes your touch.

TITLES.name: Journeyman Refiner
TITLES.description: Impurities flee before your knowledge. Material transformation is your domain.

TITLES.name: Expert Battle Sage
TITLES.description: Combat flows through you like water. Blade and mind move as one.

TITLES.name: Master Eternal Smith
TITLES.description: Legends speak of smiths who forged the impossible. You are one of them.

TITLES.name: Dragon's Bane
TITLES.description: Wyrms fear your name. The great beasts fall before you.

TITLES.name: Lucky Bastard
TITLES.description: Fortune herself smiles upon you. Or perhaps you've rigged the dice.
